thread.title: Scottish TV Guide's Description Of Trump's Inauguration Is Painfully Hilarious
thread.title_full: Scottish TV Guide's Description Of Trump's Inauguration Is Painfully Hilarious

title: Scottish TV Guide's Description Of Trump's Inauguration Is Painfully Hilarious
text:
Live Scottish TV Guide's Description Of Trump's Inauguration Is Painfully Hilarious COMING TO A WHITE HOUSE NEAR YOU Scottish TV Guide's Description Of Trump's Inauguration Is Painfully Hilarious Jan 16 2017, 3:37 PM 1 digg Blacklist story Blacklist domain With President-elect Trump's January 20 inauguration fast approaching, you're probably well aware of what other Americans think about him. But thanks to a hilariously satirical TV guide entry in the Scottish Sunday Herald, we get a little window into how Trump is viewed around the world. It's both wonderful and horrible at the same time. 
Digg is what the internet is talking about, right now. It's also the website you are currently on. HOW TO BE AN ADULT
